title: Parametric Domain
description: This represents the list of NON-default parameters customizing the computational flow which can affect the output of the calculations. These fields can be custom to each kind of analysis and are tied to a particular pipeline implementation

param.title: param
param.description: Specific variables for the computational workflow

value.description: Specific (non-default) parameter values for the computational workflow
value.title: value

step.title: step
step.description: Refers to the specific step of the workflow relevant to the parameters specified in 'param' and 'value'
